comment._content: I am not expert - but I would wager that the soldier probably carved this photo frame himself out of bone during his downtime.  A lovely frame for his children

comment.author: 61603688@N03
comment._content: I hope he made it back home to them.

comment.author: 79492347@N05
comment._content: How do you know they're siblings, as opposed to friends or cousins, for example?

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Shamrock Centurion:  We don't know for sure that they are, that's why the word "probably" is used.
